nodes.text: Barkin was a male individual who was associated with the Pryce family on the planet Lothal. When Elainye Pryce was arrested on embezzlement charges, Barkin attempted to have her released on bail while Elainye's daughter Arihnda Pryce went to meet with Senator Domus Renking. Elainye's husband Talmoor Pryce planned to visit with his daughter, but she convinced him to return home in case Barkin's attempts were successful.
Barkin was first mentioned in the 2017 novel Thrawn, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
